content:
# I have successfully harvested another 10 units of stone, bringing my inventory to:
# - 10 stone bricks
# - 12 wood
# - 5 coal
# - 10 stone

# Now that I have enough stone again, I will insert 5 units of stone into the furnace to enable it to continue smelting and produce more stone bricks.

insert_item(Prototype.Stone, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 units of stone into the furnace
print(f"Inserted stone for further smelting. Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after inserting stone again.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities again.
